title: OT64: Openn Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread where people can post about anything
- Brendan Long made some updates to the blog to improve it for mobile users
- Scott is planning a new SSC Survey and is open to suggestions for interesting questions
- Scott will be attending a meetup in New York City on December 18
- The organizers of the meetup are still looking for a location and are open to suggestions from anyone who has a big house in the city

Key learnings:
- This post is primarily an update on Scott's activities and plans
- Scott is interested in engaging with readers and meeting them in person
- The blog is being improved to make it more accessible to mobile users

Key questions:
- None provided, as this post does not appear to pose any questions.
